messages.title: A Fresh Start
messages.content: Keep Scotland in the UK and the UK in Europe

messages.title: Working hard for Glasgow North
messages.content: The West End has had Lib Dem representation at various levels for most of the last 40 years, with Maryhill joining in for most of the last 20. Local people understand how effective we’ve been in helping to keep our area one of the most vibrant communities in the UK. Brexit represents a clear and present danger to the running of higher education, healthcare and other local bodies. Independence is effectively Brexit on steroids.

messages.title: Remember…
messages.content: Andrew lives in the heart of the constituency and has been campaigning hard to stop Brexit. He has led a Council group and has years of experience helping people to improve their area.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Fresh Start for Scotland in the UK
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Jo Swinson's Liberal Democrats are the only party committed to keeping Scotland in the UK and the UK in Europe. We will move on from the division by stopping another independence referendum and getting the Brexit process sorted.

Climate change and air pollution threaten our future. Working with the EU enables us to have high environmental standards and work together. The Liberal Democrats will lead on tackling climate change, not ignoring the facts.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Challenging the SNP in Glasgow North
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats beat Labour and the Conservatives in Glasgow North in May’s European elections. There is absolutely no need for anyone to support the pro-independence SNP or Greens in order to oppose Brexit. They are using your vote as support for breaking up the UK.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The SNP want even more division with another independence referendum. They won't stop the division in our country.

issues.brexitEurope: The Conservatives want to force through a divisive Brexit that will wreck our economy. Nobody knows where Labour stand on Brexit or on Scottish independence. They keep changing their mind. Brexit represents a clear and present danger to the running of higher education, healthcare and other local bodies. Independence is effectively Brexit on steroids.
issues.economy: The Conservatives want to force through a divisive Brexit that will wreck our economy.
issues.environment: Climate change and air pollution threaten our future. Working with the EU enables us to have high environmental standards and work together. The Liberal Democrats will lead on tackling climate change, not ignoring the facts.
issues.government: Jo Swinson's Liberal Democrats are the only party committed to keeping Scotland in the UK and the UK in Europe.

community.content: The West End has had Lib Dem representation at various levels for most of the last 40 years, with Maryhill joining in for most of the last 20.

leaflet.personalStatement: Andrew says, 'The only way to get back to focusing on the issues that matter is to stop Brexit. Otherwise, we’re going to waste years negotiating with the EU.'
